detailedDescription: 5.2 acre cleared site 1 mile west of Kings Lynn, Norfolk. Previous consents for both 138-unit care village and 149-unit residential scheme.
3.9 acre site to the south of Grantham town centre. Exceptional opportunity for residential or light industrial development.
2.59-acre site 5 miles south of Nottingham with extensive frontage to the eastbound A52. Potential for roadside development (STP).
0.35-acre site in central Leicester close to De Montfort University and the city centre. Planning submitted for new-build scheme of 106 studios and 6 cluster flats.
Brownfield edge of village site with current application submitted for 13-detached and semi-detached houses
